thread.title: Where to stream your favorite Disney musicals
thread.title_full: Where to stream your favorite Disney musicals

author: USA TODAY
title: Where to stream your favorite Disney musicals
text:
TV Where to stream your favorite Disney musicals Kelly Lawler and Erin Jensen, USA TODAY Published 12:05 p.m. ET Nov. 24, 2016 | Updated 14 minutes ago 141 Shares 
You know you want to re-watch 'Mulan.' (Photo: Walt Disney Pictures) 
It may be 2017, but we're still as obsessed with Disney musicals as we were in 1991. 
Case in point: The live-action version of Beauty and the Beast is hitting theaters this Friday and we couldn't be more excited to see Belle (Emma Watson) and the Beast (Dan Stevens) dance across our screens again. 
Beauty and the Beast 's resurgence means it's the perfect time to revisit our other favorite Disney musicals, many of which are available online. After all, being able to belt the lyrics to these songs years (or decades) after viewing them for the first time is something we will always be grateful for. 
Here’s what’s available to rent or stream. On Netflix
